TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_sanek_nu_mukan, title = sanek_nu_mukan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/sanek_nu_mukan} }

S.FORM: izay caay kalecan ku sanek nu mukan? sapuelac ngatu cacay i sema' nu mita, izaw ku sepat katukuh lima malebut a sipaw nu weilei . weilei taneng matineng ku sanek nu kakaenan ilabu' nu laway niyam, patapunu' ku cucuk nu sanek. tatenga', u tineng nu mita ku sanek, caay kayadah, u cilemin , sicedam , akenek , ahecid atu aledah , lima a sanek dada'. lima a sanek pasaupu sa, sayadah tu ku caay kalecaday a sanek. aninil sa , caay kalecaday a eneng nu sema', caay kalecad ku tineng. tinaku: i zicem nu sema' sa, kapah ku tieng nu sicedamay, i lamit nu sema, kapah ku tineng nu akenek. anu patiza tu waneng itiza i lamit nu sema', caay kakapah ku tineng, anu patiza tu waneng i zicem nu sema', sicedam ku tineng nu mita. ngatu tusa uzuma sa, u macucuk tu tademaway a kakaenan, tinaku: cupel, caykaw ku sanek kuyza, u cucuk kuyza. u tineng nu mita, aledah atu adada' a katinengan malecad tuway. u aesu' nu kakaenan, caay u sema' mitineng a cacay, malawilaw tu ku aazihen a tineng, sanek nu cihek, atekak-dawmi', u tiyung nu sema'. anu caay pisanek ku cihek mukan sa, u aesu' ku kakaenan, masumad tuway. u zuma sa, akuti'ay a kakaenan taneng matieng tu sicedamay, sisa, u dihku atu liedec malawilaw tu ku sanek nu sema'. ngatu tulu sanek nu mukan sa, u tieng nu namakay cucuk nu besucay huasei . lima a sanek, yamayiliu sicedam, ahecid, akenik, cilemin atu siyan . u zikuzay "siyan", capi a demaid maazih nu kagakay . sanek nu mukan sa, u icel nu tineng tu sanek nu tuud, yamayiliu kakaenan, kuangwu atu walak . u mauzipay izaw tu ku sanek-tineng ilabu' nu laway. namakayniyan a nasulitan nasakamuwan atu natinengan Wikipayke paybalucu'ay pulungamin a cudad-sanek nu mukan Researchers Define Molecular Basis of Human "Sweet Tooth" and Umami Taste Answers to several questions of curious kids about taste nasulitan nay paybalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018-1, nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun

izay caay kalecan ko sanek no mokan? sapoelac ngato cacay i sema' no mita, izaw ko sepat katokoh lima malebot a sipaw no weilei . weilei taneng matineng ko sanek no kakaenan ilabo' no laway niyam, patapono' ko cocok no sanek. tatenga', o tineng no mita ko sanek, caay kayadah, o cilemin , sicedam , akenek , ahecid ato aledah , lima a sanek dada'. lima a sanek pasaopo sa, sayadah to ko caay kalecaday a sanek. aninil sa , caay kalecaday a eneng no sema', caay kalecad ko tineng. tinako: i zicem no sema' sa, kapah ko tieng no sicedamay, i lamit no sema, kapah ko tineng no akenek. ano patiza to waneng itiza i lamit no sema', caay kakapah ko tineng, ano patiza to waneng i zicem no sema', sicedam ko tineng no mita. ngato tosa ozoma sa, o macocok to tademaway a kakaenan, tinako: copel, caykaw ko sanek koyza, o cocok koyza. o tineng no mita, aledah ato adada' a katinengan malecad toway. o aeso' no kakaenan, caay o sema' mitineng a cacay, malawilaw to ko aazihen a tineng, sanek no cihek, atekak-dawmi', o tiyong no sema'. ano caay pisanek ko cihek mokan sa, o aeso' ko kakaenan, masomad toway. o zoma sa, akoti'ay a kakaenan taneng matieng to sicedamay, sisa, o dihko ato liedec malawilaw to ko sanek no sema'. ngato tolo sanek no mokan sa, o tieng no namakay cocok no besocay hoasei . lima a sanek, yamayilio sicedam, ahecid, akenik, cilemin ato siyan . o zikozay "siyan", capi a demaid maazih no kagakay . sanek no mokan sa, o icel no tineng to sanek no tood, yamayilio kakaenan, koangwo ato walak . o maozipay izaw to ko sanek-tineng ilabo' no laway. namakayniyan a nasolitan nasakamowan ato natinengan Wikipayke paybaloco'ay polongamin a codad-sanek no mokan Researchers Define Molecolar Basis of Homan "Sweet Tooth" and Umami Taste Answers to several qoestions of corioos kids aboot taste nasolitan nay paybaloco'ay a kawaw no sobana'ay a po 2018-1, nasolitan ni Toko Sayon
